name: CHARHON CONSULTANTS
goal: CHARHON CONSULTANTS 'aims are to provide European Public affairs services tailored to the needs and issues facing civil society organisations, trade unions and other stakeholders operating in the EU arena. Charhon Consultancy services span across  various EU affairs sectors and agendas including social inclusion and social justice, fundamental rights protections, social affairs and employment, industrial relations, CSR, EU 2020 education, training and culture, migration and development aid. Services cover EU policy tracking,  policy planning applied policy research, stakeholder dialogue, communications and EU project management.
